input_text:
Job Title: Business Intelligence Lead

Location: Houston, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Business Development, Strategy/Planning

Description:
Overview ‪CAB Enterprises, Inc., is the exclusive distributer for the Electrolit brand in the United States. The primary objective of CAB Enterprises is to lead the growth of Electrolit sales in the United States.
Position Summary As the Business Intelligence Leader, your primary role is to maintain and enhance crucial organizational reports, acting as the central data source through the data warehouse. Your key responsibilities include overseeing logistics indicators, ensuring data security, and driving innovation in analytical capabilities for Supply Chain management. Your efforts will empower the organization to make informed decisions, optimize operations, and maintain data integrity and security.
Primary ResponsibilitiesProvide end-to-end visibility of the entire supply chain, identifying internal and external events that may influence service standards in advance, including suppliers, manufacturers, and business partners. Implement advanced models and technology to create dashboards that facilitate decision-making. Define, capture, monitor, maintain key performance measures. Develop KPIs with operational leadership and ensure that the data warehouse and supporting databases effectively support the needs of the entire supply chain. Collaborate with leaders to analyze problems, optimize processes, and create presentations that effectively communicate and foster connected teams throughout the supply chain and interconnected areas. Determine the meaning of data, variables, or data models that clearly explain the operational reality so that leaders can leverage them to improve and optimize their processes and grow the business. Drive better and faster decision-making based on a holistic view of data combined with granular visibility, optimizing the supply chain. Other duties as assigned.
Required Skills & AbilitiesMust have strong interpersonal and organizational skillsAbility to effectively prioritize tasksExcellent written and verbal communication skillsExcellent presentation skillsExcellent problem solving, decision-making and conflict resolution skillsAbility to manage multiple priorities while maintaining focus and sense of urgency toward task completion

‪Required Qualifications5-7 years of experience in business intelligence or data analytics roles. Bachelor's in business administration, Computer Science, Information Systems, Data Science, or a related discipline. Previous experience as a Business Intelligence analyst or Analytics Specialist. Experience in leading business intelligence initiatives, including designing and implementing dashboards, reports, and analytics solutions. Experience using Tableau, PowerBI, Python, QlikView/Knowledge of relational databases such as Oracle, SQL Server, or MySQL. Beverage or CPG industry experience preferred.Strong working knowledge of MS Office Suite (Outlook, Excel, Work, PPT, Teams)Working knowledge of SAP or equivalent ERP system strongly preferred
Competitive compensation and benefits package. Benefits package, include:MedicalDentalVisionLife – Company PaidVoluntary LifeShort term and Long-term DisabilityFlexible Spending Account401(k) Qualified Retirement AccountEmployee Assistance ProgramPaid Time OffHolidaysCell phone/Auto Allowance
‪The above statements reflect the general details necessary to describe the principal functions of the occupation and shall not be construed as a detailed description of all the work requirements that may be inherited in the occupation.
Cab Enterprises Inc. is committed to maintaining a work environment that promotes diversity and is free of discrimination. Except where prohibited by state law, all offers of employment might be subject of passing a drug test.

Experience Level (if available): None
